headline: Jim Cramer Says L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) Is A Solid Company, Shares Sank By 5% In Mid-November
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer’s Bold Predictions About These 10 Industrial Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) stands against the other industrial stocks. As 2024 comes to an end, the flagship S&P index is up by 25.9% year to date, driven […]
